associated_reports.name: Bulk SMS
associated_reports.description:
#Send SMS text messages to selected players

* [create a new message](#zeus-bulk-message-activity-logs-zeus-bulk-message-type-) to be sent
* [check message metrics](/reports/83) for delivery rates of individual messages
* [view aggregate delivery stats](/reports/85) for all messages
associated_reports.options:
view_options:
  hide_result_count: true
  hide_export_buttons: true
#  hide_criteria_panel: true
  prevent_collapse_for_list: true
  
list_options:
  hide_in_list: true

associated_reports.name: Select Players by Flag
associated_reports.sql:
select distinct '{"field_name": "add_to_list[items][]","value": {"list_id": "' || :list_id || '","type":"player_contacts", "id":' || pc.id || ', "from_master_id":-1}}' "select items: add to list: zeus_bulk_message_recipients", pi.first_name, pi.last_name, pc.data, pc.rank 

from item_flags

inner join player_infos pi on item_id = pi.id
inner join player_contacts pc on pc.master_id = pi.master_id
left outer join zeus_bulk_message_recipients mr
  on pc.id = mr.record_id and mr.zeus_bulk_message_id = :list_id and mr.disabled = false
where 
pc.rec_type = 'phone' 
and pc.rank in (:rank)
and
(
  (:item_flag_to_search) is not null and item_flag_name_id in (:item_flag_to_search)
  or (:id_list) is not null and pi.master_id in (:id_list)
)
and mr.record_id is null
order by last_name, first_name
;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
item_flag_to_search: 
  item_flag_name: 
    all: true
    multiple: multiple
    disabled: false
    
rank: 
  general_selection: 
    label: Phone rank
    item_type: player_contacts_rank
    multiple: multiple
    disabled: false

id_list: 
  number: 
    all: true
    multiple: multiple
    label: Master ID list
    disabled: false
    hidden: true
    
list_id:
  number:
    label: ID
    hidden: true

associated_reports.name: Recipients and Delivery
associated_reports.sql:
select 
pi.first_name "first name", 
pi.last_name "last name", 
b.data "phone", 
zbms.status,
zbms.status_reason "reason"
from zeus_bulk_message_recipients b
inner join player_contacts pc on pc.id = b.record_id
inner join player_infos pi on pc.master_id = pi.master_id
left outer join zeus_bulk_message_statuses zbms
on b.id = zbms.zeus_bulk_message_recipient_id
where zeus_bulk_message_id = :list_id;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
list_id: 
  number: 
    all: true
    multiple: single
    disabled: false
    hidden: true

associated_reports.name: Players Selected
associated_reports.sql:
select 
'{"field_name": "remove_from_list[items][]","value": {"list_id": "' || :list_id || '","type":"player_contacts", "id":' || b.id || ', "from_master_id":-1}}' "select items: remove from list: zeus_bulk_message_recipients",
pi.first_name "first name", 
pi.last_name "last name", 
b.data "phone", 
b.rank "phone rank"
--, b.rec_type
--, b.response
--, pc.master_id
from zeus_bulk_message_recipients b
inner join player_contacts pc on pc.id = record_id
inner join player_infos pi on pi.master_id = pc.master_id
where zeus_bulk_message_id = :list_id
and b.disabled = false
order by b.data
associated_reports.search_attrs:
list_id: 
  number: 
    all: true
    multiple: single
    disabled: false
    hidden: true

associated_reports.name: Message Metrics
associated_reports.sql:
create temporary table temp_zbmrs
 as
   select zbmr.zeus_bulk_message_id, zbms.status, zbms.status_reason
   from zeus_bulk_message_recipients zbmr
   left join zeus_bulk_message_statuses zbms on zbmr.id = zbms.zeus_bulk_message_recipient_id
   where zbmr.disabled = false;
  
select 
zbm.name, zbm.send_date, zbm.send_time, zbm.message,
(
  select count(*) 
  from zeus_bulk_message_recipients zbmr
  where zbmr.zeus_bulk_message_id = zbm.id and zbmr.disabled = false
) recipients
,
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where temp_zbmrs.zeus_bulk_message_id = zbm.id 
  and status = 'success'
  
) delivered
,
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where temp_zbmrs.zeus_bulk_message_id = zbm.id 
  and status = 'failure'
  
) failed
,
(
  select count(*) 
  from zeus_bulk_message_recipients zbmr
  where zbmr.zeus_bulk_message_id = zbm.id and zbmr.disabled = false
) 
-
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where temp_zbmrs.zeus_bulk_message_id = zbm.id 
  and status = 'success'  
) 
- 
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where temp_zbmrs.zeus_bulk_message_id = zbm.id 
  and status = 'failure'  
) 
no_response
,
round(
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where temp_zbmrs.zeus_bulk_message_id = zbm.id 
  and status = 'success'
  
)::numeric / 
(
  select count(*) 
  from zeus_bulk_message_recipients zbmr
  where zbmr.zeus_bulk_message_id = zbm.id and zbmr.disabled = false
) * 100, 2)::varchar || '%' "delivery rate",
'{"type":"pie", "label":"Delivery Rate", "height": 150, "width": 400 ,"data": {"datasets": [{"data":[colval.delivered, colval.failed, colval.no_response], "backgroundColor": ["#00aa00","#aa0000","#dddddd"]}], "labels":["Delivered", "Failed", "No Data"]}}'
"chart:"

from zeus_bulk_messages zbm
where zbm.status = 'sent'
order by zbm.created_at desc
;

associated_reports.name: Select Players
associated_reports.sql:
select distinct 
'{"field_name": "add_to_list[items][]","value": {"list_id": "' || :list_id || '","type":"player_contacts", "id":' || pc.id || ', "from_master_id":-1}}' "select items: add to list: zeus_bulk_message_recipients", 
pi.first_name "first name", 
pi.last_name "last name", 
pc.data "phone", 
pcpi.phone_type "phone type", 
case when pc.rank = 10 then 'primary' when pc.rank = 5 then 'secondary' else 'other' end "phone rank", 
sp.name status,
a.city, a.state
from player_infos pi
inner join player_contacts pc on pc.master_id = pi.master_id
inner join addresses a on pi.master_id = a.master_id
inner join tracker_history th on th.master_id = pi.master_id
inner join sub_processes sp on th.sub_process_id = sp.id
left outer join player_contact_phone_infos pcpi on pcpi.player_contact_id = pc.id
where 
(
  (:state) is null OR a.state in (:state)
)
AND (
  (:statuses) is null OR th.sub_process_id in (:statuses)
)
AND pc.rank in (:rank)
AND pc.rec_type = 'phone'
;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
rank: 
  general_selection: 
    label: Phone number has rank
    item_type: player_contacts_rank
    multiple: multiple
    disabled: false
    default:
      - 10

statuses: 
  sub_process: 
    all: true
    multiple: multiple
    label: Player has status
    disabled: false

    default: 
      - 13

state: 
  address_state: 
    all: true
    multiple: multiple
    label: or in state
    


list_id:
  number:
    label: ID
    hidden: true
associated_reports.options:
view_options:
  hide_table_names: true
  # humanize_column_names: true

list_options:
  hide_in_list: true

associated_reports.name: Delivery Stats
associated_reports.sql:
create temporary table temp_zbmrs
 as
   select zbmr.zeus_bulk_message_id, zbms.status, zbms.status_reason
   from zeus_bulk_message_recipients zbmr
   inner join zeus_bulk_messages zbm
   on zbm.status = 'sent' and zbmr.zeus_bulk_message_id = zbm.id
   left join zeus_bulk_message_statuses zbms on zbmr.id = zbms.zeus_bulk_message_recipient_id
   where zbmr.disabled = false;
  
select 
(
  select count(*) 
  from zeus_bulk_message_recipients zbmr
  where zbmr.disabled = false
) recipients
,
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where status = 'success'
  
) delivered
,
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where status = 'failure'
  
) failed
,
(
  select count(*) 
  from zeus_bulk_message_recipients zbmr
  where zbmr.disabled = false
) 
-
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where status = 'success'  
) 
- 
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where status = 'failure'  
) 
no_response
,
round(
(
  select count(*) 
  from temp_zbmrs
  where status = 'success'
  
)::numeric / 
(
  select count(*) 
  from zeus_bulk_message_recipients zbmr
  where zbmr.disabled = false
) * 100, 2)::varchar || '%' "delivery rate",
'{"type":"pie", "label":"Delivery Rate", "width": 400, "height": 400, "data": {"datasets": [{"data":[colval.delivered, colval.failed, colval.no_response], "backgroundColor": ["#00aa00","#aa0000","#dddddd"]}], "labels":["Delivered", "Failed", "No Data"]}}'
"chart:"

;

page_layouts.options:
contains: 
  resources:
    - activity_log__zeus_bulk_messages
    
view_options:
  initial_show: true
  limit: 8
